titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-390, by Ms. Pryce (OH).

Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules: Regarding consideration or disposition of a conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 1).

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 135.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 459.
DEBATE - The House resumed debate on H. Res. 459.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H. Res. 459, the Chair put the question on ordering the previous question and by voice vote, announced that the ayes had prevailed. Ms. Slaughter demaned the yeas and nays and pursuant to clause 8 of Rule XX the Chair postponed further proceedings on ordering the previous question until later in the legislative day.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 225 - 202 (Roll no. 659).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 228 - 200 (Roll no. 660).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/21/2003--Passed House without amendment. Waives a specified requirement of rule XIII with respect to a reported resolution providing for the consideration or disposition of the conference report on H.R. 1 (Medicare Prescription Drug and Modernization Act of 2003).
